name: Haunted Hotel: Lost Dreams Collector's Edition
name_original: Haunted Hotel: Lost Dreams Collector's Edition
description:
Haunted Hotel: Lost Dreams Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Elephant Games. It came out on 08-03-2018. Big Fish Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Haunted Hotel: Lost Dreams Collector's Edition is available on PC.
